alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued September 01 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR NATALIE NAVARRO, WHITE, FEMALE, 17 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 2 INCHES, 117 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING A BLACK TANK TOP, RIPPED LIGHT BLUE SKINNY JEANS, AND BLACK CHAMPION SLIDES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR YORDY MARTINEZ, ALSO GOES BY JORDY, 21 YEARS OLD, WHITE, MALE, 5 FEET 7 INCHES, 120 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GRAY 4-DOOR SEDAN. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN DALLAS, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 4 9 7 0 4 7 2 9 NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS DALLAS POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 4 6 7 1 4 0 6 5.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler
